fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Bind a player's soul to yours each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a bound player dies, all other bound players will be dealt an Astral Basic Attack and will become unbound.
- If you die, all bound players will be dealt an Astral Unstoppable Attack.
- With the Necronomicon, you may either bind two players' souls at night or choose to kill all bound players.
